remarks: Sum of exponents law for ordinal exponentiation.  Theorem 8R of [Enderton] p. 238.  Also Proposition 8.41 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 69.  (Contributed by Eric Schmidt, 26-May-2009.)
statement: oeoa $p |- ( ( A e. On /\ B e. On /\ C e. On ) -> ( A ^o ( B +o C ) ) = ( ( A ^o B ) .o ( A ^o C ) ) ) $.
